actions.in_subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to amend section 456 of title 28, United States Code, to provide for payment of commuting expenses for justices and judges who reside within 300 miles of their official duty stations.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to require the Director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts to pay commuting expenses for justices and judges who reside within 300 miles of their official duty stations.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 456 of title 28, United States Code, to provide for payment of commuting expenses for justices and judges who reside within 300 miles of their official duty stations.
